about.title: About Me
about.intro: Bringing the authentic wisdom of traditional Indian yoga to Luxembourg with passion and dedication.

cards.title: My Journey
cards.content: Rashmi Uttarwar, a certified Yoga instructor with 500+ hours of traditional training from Pune University. I blend ancient techniques with modern understanding, backed by 3+ years of teaching experience.

cards.title: Teaching Philosophy
cards.content: My approach focuses on gentle precision of proper alignment, transformative power of mindful breathing, and deep relaxation. Each session is a journey inward, nurturing inner peace and balanced lifestyle.

items.title: Hatha Yoga
items.description: Experience transformative traditional Indian yoga philosophy. Harmonizing breath, movement, and inner awareness through structured practice including micro exercises, dynamic and static asanas, breathing exercises, and yogic sleep.

items.title: Yin Yoga
items.description: A calming practice combining asanas, pranayama, meditation and tension release exercises. Includes shaking and trembling movements to reconnect with body and emotions, concluded with guided meditation and deep relaxation.

items.title: Yin & Nidra
items.description: Gentle meditative practice working deep connective tissues. Each pose held for several minutes encouraging introspection. Includes Yoga Nidra - a deeply restful state between wakefulness and sleep achieved through guided meditation.
